topic: Prolongation of deadline for credit limits

correspondence.message: I want to apply for a prolongation of the deadline for credit limits due to adjusting to life in a new country and personal losses. I have only acquired 78 ECTS points and did not pass two exams, impacting my progress.
Please come to one of our open consultation hours without making an appointment: cit.tum.de/en/cit/academic-advising-informatics
